name: EMERGENCE
description:
This composition is a lush, meditative continuum of modular synth sounds. 

It was created through a stream-of-consciousness performance where the process itself was the destination.

Breaking away from the homogeneous notes of the past to reveal the more heterogeneous sound objects of the present, this sonic narrative starts with a simple sequence of notes that serve as a vessel on the journey you are about to embark on.

Within seconds, you are greeted by other-worldly sounds that continuously emerge from every direction - enveloping you in a beautiful, dark & ethereal sonic world.

At first, you might feel disoriented but that is ok! 

Soon the sounds become soothing and comforting as you are taken on your personal journey through inner space and beyond.

A welcome break from the commercial sounds we are inundated by on a daily basis, this genesis piece by OG SPIRATOM sets the bar high for future releases...
